title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-4.4 - Amendment of pleadings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-4.4 - Amendment of pleadings

State Regulations

Any party may amend a pleading at any time prior to the
submission of the hearing officer's report to the commission, by leave of the
hearing officer or the commission on good cause shown. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
